''We need to completely rethink the minivan,'' CEO Sergio Marchionne said Tuesday at the Canadian plant where Chrysler's minivans are made. We need to retain all its functionality but make it much more versatile. At the Detroit auto show last week, Sergio Marchionne said offering both minivans in Chrysler dealerships is confusing to customers.
